newsitem.title: USA: Plane lands in Nashville due to unruly passenger.
newsitem.headline: Plane lands in Nashville due to unruly passenger.

text.p: A USAir flight from Las Vegas to Charlotte, North Carolina was diverted to Nashville Friday after an unruly passenger threatened other people aboard, authorities said.

None of the 119 passengers on Flight 614 was injured by the man, identified as 25-year-old Daniel Walters. Some news reports said Walters brandished a knife, but spokesmen for the FBI and USAir would not confirm that he had a weapon.
FBI special agent Ken Walsh said Walters was being held, but officials did not consider it a hijacking attempt.
